name: Sequences
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

### Install Sequences:
```
$ gem install sequences
```

### Features
Sequences can currently calculate:
* The 'n'th term in either an arithmetic or geometric sequence
* The sum of 'n' terms in either type of sequence
* A certain amount of means in either type of sequence
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
